Specimen Type: Varies by test (e.g., serum, plasma, whole blood, urine)
Purpose: To describe and standardize the collection, handling, and shipment of specimens sent to ARUP Laboratories while maintaining accuracy and specimen integrity.
Container: Appropriate specimen container per ARUP test (e.g., Vacutainer, SST, EDTA tube)
Equipment: Centrifuge, aliquot tubes, specimen transport supplies, refrigerators/freezers
